title: Are there specific laws for the protection of women from harassment at the work place?
content:
"Yes!
Not only is the right to dignified work a human right, it is a specific right under the Indian Constitution. All forms of harassment listed above are also considered offenses in the work place. The Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Bill, 2012 outlines specific laws criminalizing all offenses of sexual harassment at work."
